description: The text label associated with the select input.
The placeholder text displayed inside the select field when it is empty.
Additional text that provides guidance or information about the select field.
If is cheked, the select field must be filled out before submitting the form.
If is cheked, allows the selection of multiple options in the select field.
A group of options to be displayed in the select field.
If is cheked, enables a search functionality within the select field to filter options.
If is cheked, allows the user to clear the selected option(s) in the select field.
Defines how the select field behaves based on the value of another field.
Specifies the field that the select field depends on for its disabled state.
Specifies the value of the dependent field that will disable the select field.
